name.baseName: clinker production;clinker;the kiln tail waste heat pre-drying;mixed solid wastes
熟料生产;熟料;窑尾余热预干燥;混合固废

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Calcium carbide sludge isthe co-product of acetylene generation from carbide in chemical industry, whosemain chemical composition is calcium hydrate. Before it is transported tocement industry, the moisture content of calcium carbide sludge produced fromthe acetylene generator is about 35%. However, it still can’ t meet therequirement of cement production; therefore, it needs further pre-drying tomake sure the moisture content of calcium carbide sludge reduce to 15%.Pre-drying process by waste heat from kiln tail. There is a process which is using cement kiln tail waste gas to pre-dry calcium carbide sludge to save coal consumed in this stage. One cement industry from Shandong consumes 1.2t calcium carbide sludge whose moisture content is 35% when produces 1t cement clinker. If calcium carbide sludge is pre-dried to 15%, it needs the temperature of gas from kiln tail about 700°C. Therefore, it can change the pre-heater from 5-stage to 2-stage so that make sure it has enough gas to pre-dry. However, with the decline of pre-heater stage, the clinker heat consumption will increase 1100KJ/kg, and the electricity reduced by 30%.

电石渣是化学工业中由电石产生乙炔的副产品，其主要化学成分为钙水化物。在运输到水泥工业之前，乙炔发生器产生的电石渣的含水量约为35％。然而，它仍无法满足水泥生产的要求；因此，需要进一步预干燥以确保电石渣的含水量降至15％。窑尾余热预干燥工艺。有一种使用水泥窑尾废气预干燥电石渣以节约此阶段煤炭消耗的工艺。山东的一家水泥工业在生产1吨水泥熟料时消耗1.2吨含水量为35％的电石渣。如果将电石渣预干燥至15％，则需要从窑尾排放的气体温度约为700°C。因此，可以将预热器从5级改为2级，以确保有足够的气体进行预干燥。但是，随着预热器级数的下降，熟料热消耗将增加1100KJ/kg，并且电力降低了30％。

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: Calcium carbide sludge is the co-product of acetylene generation from carbide in chemical industry, whose main chemical composition is calcium hydrate [2]. Before it is transported to cement industry, the moisture content of calcium carbide sludge produced from the acetylene generator is about 35%. However, it still can’ t meet the requirement of cement production; therefore, it needs further pre-drying to make sure the moisture content of calcium carbide sludge reduce to 15% [3]. There are two pre-drying processes currently.Coal-fired pre-drying process. Many cement industries use 5-stage pre-heater when they produce cement clinker, and the temperature of kiln tail waste gas is about 320 °C. They use rotary dryer with a coal stove to pre-dry calcium carbide sludge, i.e., after calcium carbide sludge with the moisture content about 35% entering rotary dryer, the gas from coal combustion will contact with the surface of calcium carbide sludge, exchange heat until the moisture content becomes 15%. Pre-drying process by waste heat from kiln tail. There is a process which is using cement kiln tail waste gas to pre-dry calcium carbide sludge to save coal consumed in this stage. One cement industry from Shandong consumes 1.2t calcium carbide sludge whose moisture content is 35% when produces 1t cement clinker. If calcium carbide sludge is pre-dried to 15%, it needs the temperature of gas from kiln tail about 700°C. Therefore, it can change the pre-heater from 5-stage to 2-stage so that make sure it has enough gas to pre-dry. However, with the decline of pre-heater stage, the clinker heat consumption will increase 1100KJ/kg, and the electricity reduced by 30%.

Calcium carbide sludge is the co-product of acetylene generation from carbide in chemical industry, whose main chemical composition is calcium hydrate [2]. Before it is transported to cement industry, the moisture content of calcium carbide sludge produced from the acetylene generator is about 35%. However, it still can’ t meet the requirement of cement production; therefore, it needs further pre-drying to make sure the moisture content of calcium carbide sludge reduce to 15% [3]. There are two pre-drying processes currently.Coal-fired pre-drying process. Many cement industries use 5-stage pre-heater when they produce cement clinker, and the temperature of kiln tail waste gas is about 320 °C. They use rotary dryer with a coal stove to pre-dry calcium carbide sludge, i.e., after calcium carbide sludge with the moisture content about 35% entering rotary dryer, the gas from coal combustion will contact with the surface of calcium carbide sludge, exchange heat until the moisture content becomes 15%. Pre-drying process by waste heat from kiln tail. There is a process which is using cement kiln tail waste gas to pre-dry calcium carbide sludge to save coal consumed in this stage. One cement industry from Shandong consumes 1.2t calcium carbide sludge whose moisture content is 35% when produces 1t cement clinker. If calcium carbide sludge is pre-dried to 15%, it needs the temperature of gas from kiln tail about 700°C. Therefore, it can change the pre-heater from 5-stage to 2-stage so that make sure it has enough gas to pre-dry. However, with the decline of pre-heater stage, the clinker heat consumption will increase 1100KJ/kg, and the electricity reduced by 30%.
technology.technologicalApplicability: The described industrial process involves using calcium carbide slag, a byproduct of acetylene production, as an alternative to limestone in the production of cement clinker. This material is initially pre-dried using kiln tail waste heat to reduce its moisture content, optimizing it for cement production. The process aims at material efficiency in clinker production and utilizes energy recovery practices to minimize coal consumption and hence reduce the environmental impact.
所描述的工业过程涉及使用电石渣（乙炔生产的副产品），作为生产水泥熟料替代石灰石的原料。这种材料最初使用窑尾余热预干燥以降低其含水量，优化其水泥生产过程。该过程旨在物料效率的水泥熟料生产，并利用能源回收实践以最大限度地减少煤炭消耗，从而减少环境影响。

mathematicalRelations.modelDescription: This functional unit is set for 1 ton of cement clinker with a compressive strength of up to 42.5MPa.The life cycle of cement clinker production can be divided into six stages: mining, transportation, energy production, production of calcium carbide slag, processing of calcium carbide slag and production of cement clinker.
该功能单元的设置为1吨抗压强度高达42.5MPa的水泥熟料。水泥熟料生产的生命周期可以分为六个阶段：采矿、运输、能源生产、生产电石渣、处理电石渣和生产水泥熟料。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: The production process data of using carbide slag to replace limestone comes from a cement plant in Shandong. The plant uses a coal-fired pre-drying process, and the coal consumption in the pre-drying stage is 50.4kg. Under the premise that the raw materials and other production processes remain unchanged, when the kiln tail waste heat pre-drying process is used, the coal transferred by waste heat is 55.16kg. This data comes from a cement industry in Jiaozuo City.power generation process. The power generation life cycle inventory includes resource/energy consumption and pollutant emissions, and its data is taken from the Sinocenter database. Mineral mining process. The limestone life cycle inventory data comes from the material life cycle data of Sinocenter of Beijing University of Technology, while the inventory lists of clay and sandstone come from the Ecoinvent database. road transport process. The average distance from limestone mines or calcium carbide slag to cement plants is 2 kilometers. In addition, based on the average transportation distance of raw coal and commodities in China, the transportation distances of raw coal and other raw materials are assumed to be 179 kilometers and 177 kilometers respectively. The transportation process life cycle inventory data also comes from the Sinocenter database. Carbide slag production process. Generally speaking, each ton of calcium carbide hydrolysis can produce 1.2 tons of carbide slag (dry basis) and 300 liters of acetylene. Therefore, the environmental impact of this process needs to be allocated to the two products, namely carbide slag and acetylene. According to the distribution rules of economic value, carbide slag should bear 0.74% of the total environmental load. Calcium carbide production inventory data comes from reference literature.

利用电石渣替代石灰石的生产过程数据来自山东某水泥厂，该厂采用燃煤预干工艺，预干阶段的煤耗为50.4kg。在原料和其他生产过程不变的前提下，采用窑尾余热预干工艺时，余热转移的煤为55.16kg，该数据来自于焦作市一家水泥工业。发电过程。发电生命周期清单包括资源/能源消耗和污染物排放，其数据取自Sinocenter数据库。矿物开采过程。石灰石生命周期清单数据来自北京工业大学Sinocenter的材料生命周期数据，而粘土、砂岩的清单清单则来自Ecoinvent数据库。公路运输过程。从石灰石矿或电石渣到水泥厂的平均距离为2公里。此外，根据中国原煤和商品的平均运输距离，原煤和其他原材料的运输距离分别假设为179公里和177公里。运输过程生命周期清单数据也是来自Sinocenter数据库。电石渣生产过程。一般来说，每吨电石水解可以产生1.2吨电石渣（干基）和300升乙炔。因此，需要将这个过程中的环境影响分配给这两种产品，即电石渣和乙炔。根据经济价值的分配规则，电石渣应承担总环境负荷的0.74%。电石泥生产清单数据来自于参考文献。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Jia Ping Cui et al. (2014). Life Cycle Assessment of Silicate Cementitious Material Production Using Calcium Carbide Sludge. Key Engineering Materials 599, 324–327.
Jia Ping Cui et al. (2014). Life Cycle Assessment of Silicate Cementitious Material Production Using Calcium Carbide Sludge. Key Engineering Materials 599, 324–327.

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When utilizing this data set for Life Cycle Assessment of cement clinker production, attention should be paid to factors such as the method used for pre-drying the calcium carbide slag, specific energy consumption, and emissions associated with different stages of the process. Users should consider the trade-offs between coal consumption and the environmental impact of using kiln tail waste heat for pre-drying versus coal-fired methods. Allocation of environmental impacts between acetylene and calcium carbide slag in the production process must follow economic value distribution rules, with carbide slag bearing 0.74% of the total environmental load.
在使用该数据集进行水泥熟料生产的生命周期评估时，应注意预干燥电石渣所用方法、特定能源消耗以及与过程不同阶段相关的排放等因素。用户应考虑煤炭消耗与使用窑尾余热预干燥相比燃煤方法的环境影响之间的权衡。在生产过程中，电石渣与乙炔环境影响的分配必须遵循经济价值分配规则，电石渣应承担总环境负荷的0.74%。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: PM. The particle size is not specified. Here we treat it as PM>10.
